pandoc 
  to: revealjs
  output-file: slides.html
  standalone: true
  wrap: none
  default-image-extension: png
  html-math-method:
    method: mathjax

      https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/mathjax/2.7.0/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS_HTML-full
  slide-level: 2
  
metadata
  link-citations: true
  width: 1050
  height: 700
  margin: 0.1
  center: false
  navigationMode: linear
  controlsLayout: edges
  controlsTutorial: false
  hash: true
  history: true
  hashOneBasedIndex: false
  fragmentInURL: false
  transition: none
  backgroundTransition: none
  pdfSeparateFragments: false
  lang: en
  auto-stretch: true
  title: Simple Linear Regression
  author: 'Anthony Raborn, Psychometrician'
  affiliation: National Association of Boards of Pharmacy
  editor_options:
    chunk_output_type: console
  theme: dark
